reviewText: As far as GGW videos go, this one was surprisingly good. A lot of great bouncy breasts.

This is certainly a hot Girls Gone Wild entry, although the title "Hot Summer Breast Fest" is rather an exaggeration.  What I mean is that this is typical of most other GGW shows, so that while all the girls on are very nice looking, on average they have ample but not enormous breasts.  Of the girls featured in extended segments, 2 of them are stacked, and the other 3 have moderate-sized breasts. Most of the girls who flash the camera at clubs and such are pretty stacked, though. If you want to see a higher percentage of stacked girls, I'd recommend trying one of their DVDs specifically for this, like "Girls Gone Wild: My Big Breasts." And while all the girls in extended segments are shown totally nude, there is a little censoring when one of the girls is playing with herself. This DVD has good widescreen camerawork and editing, and the sound is usually live, with occasional music blended in. Run time is 52 minutes, which is not very generous. Bonuses are trailers for 4 other GGW videos and website links, while the sound options are 2.0 Dolby Digital or 5.1 Surround Sound. I recommend "Girls Gone Wild: Hot Summer Breast Fest," even though it's not a standout.
